name: Virtual Dream Center 3.0
description:
Virtual Dream Center is an online art center. 

"Virtual Dream Center 3.0" features the following virtual exhibitions :

JON MERRITT : "DRAGON ON A SNOWFLAKE"
JESSICA BOUBETRA : "THE WAVE OF MIND"
TERENCIO GONZALES : "POLYLIGHTS"
SABRINA VITALI : "JOURNEY THROUGH A BODY"

www.virtualdreamcenter.xyz
